title: Article 1 - Classes A and B
content:
Article 1 - Classes A and B
State Regulations

Part 460 - General Provisions (§ 460.0 to 460.1)

Part 461 - Instructions-general (§ 461.1 to 461.17)

Part 462 - Instructions-balance Sheet Accounts (§ 462.1 to 462.9)

Part 463 - Instructions-steam Plant Accounts (§ 463.1 to 463.14)

Part 464 - Instructions-earned Surplus Account (§ 464.1)

Part 465 - Instructions-income Accounts (§ 465.1 to 465.4)

Part 466 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts (§ 466.1 to 466.6)

Part 467 - Instructions-operation And Maintenance Accounts (§ 467.1 to 467.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
